name: ErrorCodeAttribute_getReasonPhraseTest
description: Unit tests for the getReasonPhrase method of the ErrorCodeAttribute class.

test_cases.name: testGetReasonPhraseWithNullReasonPhrase
test_cases.description: Tests that the reason phrase is null when not set.

test_cases.name: testGetReasonPhraseWithSetReasonPhrase
test_cases.description: Tests that the reason phrase matches the set value.

test_cases.name: testGetReasonPhraseAfterSettingErrorCode
test_cases.description: Tests that the reason phrase matches the default reason phrase for the error code.

test_cases.name: testGetReasonPhraseAfterOverridingWithSetReasonPhrase
test_cases.description: Tests that the reason phrase matches the custom set value after overriding the default.
